events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request for a refund has been identified and categorized under refund-related issues for further processing.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and provide assistance to the customer.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund quickly, could you please share the order ID and the reason why you want the refund?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The item did not match the description on your website, so I do not want to keep it.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and you should see the amount credited back within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for handling this quickly. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund request for order 123456789 has been successfully processed, and the case is now marked as resolved.
We are following up to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Closing this support case as the refund has been successfully issued and the customer confirmed receipt.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to collect feedback on their experience with the refund process.
